title: Balance Gem-Water Pod by VitaJuwel
description: SODALITE  CHALCEDONY  CLEAR QUARTZ If creating harmony among all aspects of your busy life is something you seek, look no further! Traditional Naturopathic Uses: In the natural healing arts this blend of sodalite and clear quartz is said to encourage awareness, being true to oneself and even help quench your thirst!
cleaned_text: harmony among all aspects of your busy life is something you seek, look no further! Traditional Naturopathic Uses: In the natural healing arts this blend of sodalite and clear quartz is said to encourage awareness, being true to oneself and even help quench your thirst! The powerful addition of chalcedony is with the intention to bring the mind, body, emotions and spirit all into harmony.
